import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const url="http://localhost:3001/" class Registration extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state={ fname:'', lname:'', email:'', password:'', cpassword:'', location:'' } } inputHandler=(e)=> { this.setState( { ...this.state , [e.target.name] : e.target.value }) } //Get form data after submit submitHandler=async (event)=> { //control page loading after submit Formdata event.preventDefault() await axios.post(url,this.state).then(()=> this.props.history.push(`/user`)) } render() { const {fname,lname,email,password,cpassword,location}=this.state return( <> {/* heading */}

REGISTRATION FORM

{/* heading */} {/* registration form */}
{/* registration form */} ) } } export default Registration;
